ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes, I would recommend the course (because it is required).
This is a very good course for first year graduate students in EEB. The format of the writing module could be improved, but it is still interesting and worthwhile as is.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course provided good insight into the technical aspects of a career in biological research. I'm sure these understandings will be very helpful as I move forward with my career.

The NSF panel definitely helped me understand how grants are evaluated and will likely affect the way I think about research and write grants in the future. The Zimmer writing workshop was fun enough but not likely to change anything about my research or writing.
